source_caption_data.pre_caption: A shoulder-up shot frames a humanoid figure in the left foreground, positioned at eye level with the camera. The figure looks toward a closed white door located in the center background. To the right of the door, a light switch is visible on the wall in the background, while a wooden floor occupies the bottom of the frame. The focus then shifts from the humanoid figure to the door, causing the figure in the foreground to become slightly blurry while the door in the background comes into sharp focus.
